name: Koong Karee Recipe (Shrimp Yellow Curry Stir-Fry)
description: This easy koong karee recipe makes a delicious shrimp yellow curry stir-fry that's perfect for the family with jasmine rice.
recipeIngredient: 8.8 ounces shrimp (peeled and deveined, see notes)
0.7 ounces green onions (sliced into 2-inch sized pieces)
1  prik chi fa (sliced, add to taste)

recipeInstructions.text: In a bowl, whisk the eggs and stir in the chili paste. Add in sugar, soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and evaporated milk. Mix everything well.
recipeInstructions.name: In a bowl, whisk the eggs and stir in the chili paste. Add in sugar, soy sauce, fish sauce, oyster sauce, and evaporated milk. Mix everything well.

recipeInstructions.text: Heat oil in a wok over medium heat. Fry the garlic until it’s aromatic. Add the yellow curry powder, stir for about 5 seconds to avoid burning, and move to the next step quickly.
recipeInstructions.name: Heat oil in a wok over medium heat. Fry the garlic until it’s aromatic. Add the yellow curry powder, stir for about 5 seconds to avoid burning, and move to the next step quickly.

recipeInstructions.text: Toss in the shrimp, ensuring it gets well-coated with the curry powder. Cook it until it’s halfway done.
recipeInstructions.name: Toss in the shrimp, ensuring it gets well-coated with the curry powder. Cook it until it’s halfway done.

recipeInstructions.text: Add the onions and chilies into the wok. Cook them until they start to soften, which should take about a minute.
recipeInstructions.name: Add the onions and chilies into the wok. Cook them until they start to soften, which should take about a minute.

recipeInstructions.text: Pour the egg mixture (from step 1) into the wok. Let everything cook together for 2 minutes or until the eggs are fully cooked, stirring continuously. Mix in the green onions and celery last, then take the wok off the heat. Serve immediately with rice. Enjoy!
recipeInstructions.name: Pour the egg mixture (from step 1) into the wok. Let everything cook together for 2 minutes or until the eggs are fully cooked, stirring continuously. Mix in the green onions and celery last, then take the wok off the heat. Serve immediately with rice. Enjoy!

keywords: koong karee, shrimp yellow curry, yellow curry stir-fry
